posts.post_content: If you think a little, the ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) pumping, although not as powerful as having double strike, adds a lot of firepower capability to these guy. He'd be hitting by 10, in the air, only-blockable-by-2-or-more by next turn, given that he survives removal.
